data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Yang, van Achterberg, Cornelis, Chen, Xue-xin (2017): Review of the genus Craspedolcus Enderlein sensu lato in China, with the description of a new genus and four new species (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Braconinae). ZooKeys 647: 37-65, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.647.11247, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.647.11247
